name: Walk The Plank
description:
Walk, run and jump across this intergalactic space portal, challenge your friends to beat your time but remember... DON'T FALL IN!!!

This is not a game for "quietly-sitting-in-a-corner" types. You WILL look silly, you WILL look ridiculous and you WILL laugh your socks off with your friends!

*Note from the developer*
This is the first in a series of social, augmented reality games from LoveShark. If you have any feedback, ideas or suggestions, please get in touch with us on hello@loveshark.io
